product_description: AFGHANI CORN BREAD "Doda"; INGREDIENTS: Corn Flour, Sugar, Vegetable Oil, Eggs, Milk, Black Seeds, Caardamom; ALLERGEN STATEMENT: This product contains eggs, milk, and may contain traces of nuts. NET WT 24.0 oz (680g); Keep Cool. Reheat in oven if desired.

initial_firm_notification: Two or more of the following: Email, Fax, Letter, Press Release, Telephone, Visit

distribution_pattern: Distributed in CA, OR, and WA
